attributes.additional_details:
If those that believed in vivisection cared about their children or other humans they would put forth them self for vivisection as it is a scientific fact that humans are better models for studying humans than other species of animals. But no pro-vivisection does because they care more about themselves than their children or other peoples children or other adult humans or other species of animals.

Hence pro-vivisectionists are and vivisection is immoral and it should be banned.
